doc: A type on contact such as phone call, in person visit, etc.
name: type

fields.name: name
fields.doc: A descriptive name for the type of contact

fields.name: project
fields.doc: The project who created and owns this type of contact reason

fields.name: createdBy
fields.doc: The com.orcatech.user.id for the user who created the record

fields.name: updatedBy
fields.doc: The com.orcatech.user.id for the user who updated the record

fields.name: deletedBy
